name: Time To Kill (AppleFruitGames)
description:
Time To Kill was the game made by our team of 3 for WowieGameJam 3.0 in 3 days. It is a relatively simple puzzle-platformer taking place in space as astronauts; however, when you reach your end goal, a clock, you become evil and turn back time. Once you are evil, in order to pass the level, you have to make your previous self die. You can use different mechanics such as lasers, moveable blocks, and doors.

Controls:

Move with w and s or arrows

Jump with space bar

Restart level with r
